title: Module missing declaration
explanation: To use MyComponent within this module (or export it), it must be listed in the declarations array.

title: Component selector prefix
explanation: Default prefix is 'app'. Valid selector.

title: Banana in box syntax
explanation: Two-way binding syntax is `[(ngModel)]` (banana IN a box), not `([ngModel])`.

title: Service providedIn root
explanation: Makes the service a singleton available throughout the app (tree-shakable).

title: Structural directive asterisk
explanation: Structural directives require an asterisk prefix: `*ngIf="condition"` (or strict template syntax).

title: Pipe transform method
explanation: Pipes must implement the PipeTransform interface with a `transform` method.

title: Constructor binding injection
explanation: Missing access modifier (private/public/protected). 'service' won't be a class property, just a constructor arg. Usually you want `constructor(private service: MyService)`.

title: Lifecycle hook interface
explanation: Implementing the interface is good practice (though not strictly required for the hook to run).

title: Event binding syntax
explanation: Event binding uses parentheses `(click)`, not square brackets `[click]` (which is property binding).

title: Template reference variable
explanation: `#var` declares a template reference variable.

title: Interpolation non-string
explanation: Angular sanitizes interpolation. Script tags will be escaped/removed, but writing them suggests misunderstanding safety.

title: Safe navigation operator
explanation: Prevents error if `user` is null/undefined.

title: Private component property in template
explanation: AoT compilation often fails if private properties are accessed in template. Should be public (or protected).

title: Input decorator
explanation: Marks a property as an input binding.

title: Output missing EventEmitter
explanation: @Output properties should be instances of `EventEmitter` (which extends Subject, but Angular expects EventEmitter for template binding).

title: Async pipe usage
explanation: Subscribes to observable and updates view with emitted values. Handles unsubscribe automatically.

title: NgFor syntax
explanation: Syntax is `let item of items`, not `in`.

title: NgClass object syntax
explanation: Applies class 'active' if isActive is true.

title: Duplicate attribute binding
explanation: Mixing static class attribute and `[class]` binding often overwrites the static class (or behavior is unexpected). Use `[ngClass]` or `[class.name]` to mix.

title: NgModel standalone
explanation: Used when using ngModel inside a form tag but excluding it from parent form control.

title: Pipe in component class
explanation: `DatePipe` is a class, but `transform` is an instance method. You must inject DatePipe (and add to providers) or instantiate it `new DatePipe('en').transform(...)`.

title: RouterLink directive
explanation: Binds to array of path segments.

title: Direct DOM access
explanation: Avoid direct DOM manipulation. Use Angular binding, Renderer2, or ElementRef (cautiously).

title: Style encapsulation default
explanation: Angular uses ViewEncapsulation.Emulated by default (adding attributes to separate styles).

title: Incorrect Directive selector
explanation: If intended as an attribute directive, usage `<div myDir>` requires selector `[myDir]`. Selector `myDir` implies an element `<myDir>`.

title: Input alias
explanation: Binds to `<comp [aliasName]="val" />` but usage in class is `propName`.

title: Const in template
explanation: Cannot declare variables (const/let) inside binding expressions directly like this. Use `*ngIf="1 as x"`.

title: TrackBy function
explanation: Improves rendering performance by tracking items by ID instead of object reference.

title: Multiple structural directives
explanation: Elements can only have one structural directive. Use `<ng-container>` wrapper.

title: HostListener decorator
explanation: Listens to events on the host element of the component/directive.

title: Impure pipe state
codeSnippet:
@Pipe({ name: 'sort' })
// mutating input array inside transform
explanation: Default pipes are pure. They only run if reference changes. Mutating array usually won't trigger update unless `pure: false` (which is bad for perf). Sort pipe usually needs `pure: false` or immutable data flow.

title: NgContent select
explanation:
Projects content matching the selector (e.g. `
...
`).

title: Missing CommonModule
explanation: *ngIf, *ngFor are part of CommonModule. Must import it in feature modules.

title: Router outlet
explanation: Placeholder for routed components.

title: Provider token mismatch
explanation: Cannot inject by type 'string' (interfaces/primitive types disappear at runtime). Must use `@Inject('API_URL')`.

title: NgTemplate outlet
explanation: Instantiates a template defined by `<ng-template #tmpl>`.

title: Observable subscription leak
explanation: Manual subscription in component must be unsubscribed in ngOnDestroy (or use takeUntil/AsyncPipe) to avoid leaks.

title: CanActivate guard
explanation: Prevents navigation to a route if guard returns false.

title: Void element content
explanation: Input is a void element. It cannot have content or closing tag.

title: ViewChild static true
explanation: Makes the query result available in ngOnInit (instead of ngAfterViewInit). Only works if element not in structural directive.

title: Template var scope
explanation: Variable 'x' is scoped to the template of the ngIf div. Cannot be accessed outside it.

title: Class binding syntax
explanation: Toggles class 'active' based on boolean expression.

title: Invalid pipe argument
explanation: DatePipe accepts format, timezone, locale. Checking arguments matches signature.

title: ContentChild
explanation: Queries content projected into the component (via ng-content).

title: Service in component providers
explanation: Not strictly an error, but providing a service in Component `providers` creates a NEW instance for every component. Often unintentional if singleton desired.

title: InjectionToken
explanation: Used to create unique tokens for DI, especially for non-class dependencies.

title: Call expression in template
explanation: Calling functions in templates runs on every change detection cycle. Bad for performance. Use pipes or pre-calculated property.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular
explanation: Runs code without triggering change detection (e.g. frequent events like scroll/mousemove).

title: Router path slash
explanation: Route paths should not start with a slash (relative to root). Use 'user'.

title: OnPush strategy
explanation: Component checks only when inputs change reference, events occur, or manual markForCheck.

title: Module export transitive
explanation: Imports are not inherited/transitive unless the imported module 'exports' them. If SharedModule exports FormsModule, it works. If not, error.

title: Async validator
explanation: Third argument of FormControl is for async validators.

title: Observable subscribe in service
explanation: Services should typically return Observables, not subscriptions. Let the component subscribe (async pipe). Returning subscription makes it hard to use data.

title: FormBuilder group
explanation: Creates a FormGroup.

title: Lazy loading path
explanation: String syntax for lazy loading is deprecated/removed in Ivy. Use dynamic import: `() => import('./...').then(m => m.UserModule)`.

title: NgModelGroup
explanation: Groups form controls in a template-driven form.

title: Event emitter emit value
explanation: EventEmitter only supports emitting a single value. Wrap multiple values in an object.

title: Pure pipe optimization
codeSnippet: // Pure pipes run only when input reference changes?
explanation: Yes, highly optimized compared to functions in templates.

title: Reactive form control name
explanation: Reactive forms require `formControlName="first"`. `name` attribute isn't enough to bind to the form group control.

title: ViewEncapsulation.None
explanation: Styles become global (no scoping).

title: Inject decorator on class
explanation: `@Inject` is a parameter decorator (for constructor args), not a class decorator.

title: NgIf else syntax
explanation: Standard syntax for else block.

title: Component inheritance metadata
codeSnippet:
class Base { @Input() id; }
@Component(...) class Child extends Base {}
explanation: If Base is not an Abstract Class or doesn't have @Component/@Directive, metadata (Inputs) isn't inherited cleanly usually needing decorators on Child too? Actually, in recent Angular, Inputs ARE inherited from simpler classes or directives. But best practice is Base should be a Directive or abstract.

title: PreloadingStrategy
explanation: Configures router to preload lazy modules in background.

title: Http interceptor provider
explanation: Interceptors must be provided via `HTTP_INTERCEPTORS` token with `multi: true`.

title: RxJS takeUntil
explanation: Common pattern for auto-unsubscribing.

title: ChangeDetection ref check
explanation: Not strictly an error, but detaching change detector means the view will never update unless manually re-attached or detectChanges called. Risky if unintentional.

title: Resolve guard
explanation: Prefetches data before route activation.

title: Nested subscribe
explanation: Anti-pattern. Use switching operators (switchMap, mergeMap) to handle nested streams.

title: Schematics
explanation: CLI uses schematics to generate code.

title: Private service public access
explanation: Template cannot access private members of component.

title: Standalone component
explanation: Angular 14+ feature allowing components without NgModules.

title: Missing Super call
explanation: Derived classes with constructors must call `super()`.

title: Environment injection
explanation: `inject()` function can be used in constructor props initialization or factory functions.

title: Duplicated providers
explanation: Component provider shadows the module provider, creating a separate instance. Usually bugs if state sharing is expected.

title: TitleStrategy
explanation: Customizes how page titles are set from route data.

title: Recursive component missing base case
explanation: Infinite recursion if not guarded (though ngFor usually guards empty list). If logic is flawed loops forever.

title: APP_INITIALIZER
explanation: Token for functions that run during app initialization (blocks startup until promise resolves).

title: Wrong lifecycle name
explanation: There is no `ngOnMount`. It's `ngOnInit`.

title: RouterLinkActive
explanation: Applies class when the associated route is active.

title: Invalid host binding syntax
explanation: Host property syntax is keys without brackets typically? No, `[class]` is valid key in host object. Wait, `host: { 'class': 'valid' }` is static. `host: { '[class.valid]': 'isValid' }` binding. The string 'valid' is treated as property on component instance? Syntax `[class]: "valid"` tries to look up property `valid`. If `valid` not on class, error.

title: NgswConfig
explanation: Configuration file for Angular Service Worker.

title: Input property write
explanation: Overwriting an @Input property breaks the data flow (changes are local and overwritten on next regular change detection update from parent).

title: Defer block
explanation: Lazy loading block syntax.

title: Observable missing share
codeSnippet:
this.obs$ = this.http.get('url');
// multiple async pipes in template
explanation: Multiple async pipes subscribe multiple times, causing multiple HTTP requests. Use `shareReplay(1)`.

title: Self decorator
explanation: Restricts dependency resolution to the local injector.

title: Template let syntax
explanation: let syntax requires explicit assignment from context: `let vals = ngIf` (if context provides it) or `as vals`.

title: SkipSelf
explanation: Skips the local injector and looks up in the parent.

title: Invalid Output event type
explanation: Type mismatch. Expected string, got number.

title: Attribute decorator
explanation: Injects a static attribute value (const string) rather than a property binding.

title: Async pipe on array
explanation: Async pipe expects an Observable or Promise. Passing a raw array throws error.

title: Signals
explanation: New reactive primitive in Angular.

title: Circular dependency module
codeSnippet: A imports B, B imports A.
explanation: Circular dependency causes runtime errors or 'undefined' tokens.

title: HostBinding
explanation: Binds a host element property/class/style to a directive property.

title: CanMatch guard missing
explanation: Empty array or usage implies route matching. CanMatch replaced CanLoad for finer control. Syntax requires guard functions/classes.

title: ViewProviders
explanation: Restricts providers to the view only (not available to content children).

title: Constructor implementation in interface
explanation: Interfaces cannot declare constructors in TypeScript (constructors are part of the static side, not instance side).

title: ControlValueAccessor
explanation: Interface to integrate custom components with Angular Forms API.

title: Missing inputs in module
explanation: Wait, missing inputs? If using `[formGroup]`, needs ReactiveFormsModule. If getting error, maybe missing? Not an error snippet per se unless context implies template usage without import. Snippet is valid config.

title: Forms module collision
explanation: While legal, mixing Template-driven and Reactive forms on the same input is discouraged/deprecated and causes issues.

title: Unsubscribe missing in pipe
explanation: Trick question: Async pipe handles unsubscribe automatically. No error here.

title: NgContent select class
explanation: Content projection supports class selectors.

title: Router events filter
explanation: Correct logic, but often safer to use `router.events.pipe(filter(e => e instanceof NavigationEnd)).subscribe(...)` for type safety/clarity. Not strictly an error, just verbose imperative style.

title: ProvidedIn 'any'
explanation: Creates a new instance for every lazy-loaded module that injects it (unlike 'root' which is singleton).

title: Service unused injection
codeSnippet:
constructor(private http: HttpClient) {}
// http never used
explanation: Unused dependency injection increases bundle size and initialization cost. Remove if not used.

title: TestBed configureTestingModule
explanation: Configures the testing module similarly to NgModule.

title: Accessing DOM in service
explanation: Service access to global `document` breaks SSR (Server Side Rendering). Use DOCUMENT injection token.

title: CanDeactivate guard
explanation: Checks if we can navigate AWAY from the current route (e.g. unsaved changes).

title: RxJS subscribe leak (2)
explanation: Interval is infinite. Missing unsubscribe causes permanent leak even after component destruction.

title: Default change detection
codeSnippet: // Default strategy checks entire tree top-down?
explanation: Yes, `CheckAlways` (Default) checks everything dirty or not (unless OnPush used).

title: Empty directive selector
explanation: Selector cannot be empty.

title: Route data static
explanation: Static data passed to the route component.

title: Input decorator required
codeSnippet:
@Input({ required: true }) val: string;
// Usage: <comp /> (val missing)
explanation: If input is marked required, build/template error occurs if omitted. (Angular 16+ feature).

title: NgTemplateOutletContext
explanation: Passes context data to the template. $implicit is the default value.

title: Invalid ViewChild selector
explanation: ViewChild selector must be class type, template ref string, or provider token. Number is invalid.

title: Component styles array
explanation: Inline styles array definition.

title: NgSwitch default
explanation:
Correct syntax. Wait, error? No, `*ngSwitchDefault` is correct. 
Error: `[ngSwitchDefault]`. it's a structural directive `*`.

title: NgSwitchCase binding
explanation: If 'match' is a string literal 'A', syntax is `*ngSwitchCase="'A'"`. If 'match' is property, valid. But common error is forgetting quotes for string: `*ngSwitchCase="A"` (looks for prop A).

title: DestroyRef
explanation: Allows registering destroy callbacks without implementing OnDestroy interface (useful in functions).

title: Injecting ChangeDetectorRef in Service
explanation: ChangeDetectorRef is tied to a specific view (Component). Services are singletons (usually) and don't have a view. Injection fails (unless view provider specific scope, but mostly error).

title: RxJS shareReplay
explanation: Caches the last emitted value and manages subscriptions via refCount (auto-unsubscribe when 0 listeners).

title: Private constructor injection
explanation:
Valid TS, but verbose usage compared to `constructor(private s: MyService)`. Not an error, just old style. 
Error: `constructor(private @Inject(TOKEN))`. Syntax error.

title: Router parameter subscription
explanation: Correct way to handle dynamic parameters when component checks might not re-instantiate.

title: HostListener undefined args
explanation: Missing args array in decorator: `@HostListener('click', ['$event'])`. Without `$event`, 'e' is undefined.

title: Optional dependency
explanation: If dependency not found, returns null instead of throwing error.

title: Template statement assignment
explanation: Cannot declare variables in template statements. Assignments must be to existing properties.

title: PlatformBrowserDynamic
explanation: Standard JIT bootstrapping for browser.

title: Duplicate pipes
explanation: Redundant. Second date pipe receives string from first. Maybe valid if formatting changed, but usually logic error.

title: Custom Structural Directive
explanation: Structural directives need TemplateRef (content) and ViewContainerRef (where to render).

title: Output name collision
explanation: Naming output 'click' conflicts with native click event. Might cause double firing or unexpected behavior.

title: ViewChildren QueryList
explanation: Returns a live observable list of components.

title: Missing browser animations
explanation: Animations require `BrowserAnimationsModule` (or `provideAnimations()`).

title: RxJS tap operator
explanation: Side effects operator (does not modify value).

title: NgModule bootstrap empty
explanation: Root module must bootstrap at least one component (usually AppComponent).

title: Router Wildcard
explanation: Matches any URL not matched by previous routes. Must be last.

title: Async pipe with non-observable
explanation: Async pipe throws if input is not Observable or Promise (e.g. invalid pipe argument).

title: Angular Element (Web Component)
explanation: Wraps Angular component as a standard Web Component.

title: Http interceptor scope
explanation: HTTP Interceptors provided in lazy modules are IGNORED by HttpClient service inherited from root. Must be provided in root/AppModule (unless creating new HttpClient instance).

title: RouterLinkActiveOptions
explanation: Matches precise URL instead of subset.

title: Multiple component selector match
explanation: Angular throws error if multiple components match same element.

title: FormArray push
explanation: Adds a control to the array.

title: Invalid template variable assignment
explanation: Template reference variables (`#ref`) are read-only in the template scope. Cannot assign to them.

title: NgZone run
explanation: Re-enters Angular zone to trigger change detection (e.g. from third-party callbacks).

title: Service public properties encapsulation
explanation: Not an error, but exposing mutable data publicly allows any component to corrupt state. Better to use BehaviorSubject and expose as Observable.

title: RxJS switchMap
explanation: Cancels previous inner observable (request) if new value arrives. Ideal for search typeaheads.

title: Circular dependency injection
codeSnippet: A injects B, B injects A.
explanation: DI Cyclic Dependency error. Use `@Inject(forwardRef(() => A))` to resolve.

title: AbstractControl parent
explanation: Access the parent FormGroup/FormArray.

title: Missing declarations
explanation: Classic error meaning Component is not declared in the current module (or imported).

title: CurrencyPipe
explanation: Formats number as currency.

title: Standalone component imports
explanation: Standalone components must explicitly import dependencies (like CommonModule/NgIf) in the `imports` array of the Component decorator.

title: Defer on interaction
explanation: Loads content when user interacts with element 'btn'.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular usage
explanation: If 'data' is bound in template, updating it outside Angular zone requires manually calling `detectChanges()` or wrapping update in `zone.run()`. Otherwise UI won't update.

title: QueryList changes
explanation: QueryList emits an event whenever the list of matched elements changes.

title: Pure pipe impurity
explanation: `arr.reverse()` mutates the input array in place. Pure pipes should not mutate inputs. It affects the source data in component.

title: RouterLinkActive exact
explanation: Ensures active class is applied only when URL matches exactly.

title: Directive providers vs viewProviders
explanation: Directives do not have a view, so `viewProviders` is invalid configuration for @Directive (only valid for @Component).

title: KeyValuePipe
explanation: Iterates over object keys and values.

title: Multiple template bindings
explanation: Cannot have multiple template bindings (structural directives) on one element.

title: Router navigate relative
explanation: Navigates relative to the current ActivatedRoute.

title: Constructor async
explanation: Constructors cannot be async. Do initialization in `ngOnInit`.

title: ng-container
explanation: Logical container that doesn't render a DOM element.

title: Subject vs BehaviorSubject
explanation: Subject does not hold current value. `getValue()` is a method of `BehaviorSubject`.

title: ViewChildren descendants
explanation: Reads a specific token (ElementRef) from the matched components.

title: Host element attribute selector
explanation:
Valid syntax for styling host element when it has class 'active'. Wait, this IS valid. 
Error: `:host-context(.theme)`. Also valid. 
What is invalid? `::ng-deep` is deprecated but valid. 
Maybe `host-context` inside `styles` array without encapsulation? 
Let's assume the error is conceptual: `:host` targets the shadow root host. 
Actually `:host(.class)` acts if host has class. 
Maybe the error is omitting parentheses? `:host .child` IS valid.

title: NgDeep deprecated
explanation: `::ng-deep` is deprecated. Use ViewEncapsulation.None or global styles instead.

title: HttpParams immutable
codeSnippet:
let params = new HttpParams();
params = params.set('param', 'value');
explanation: HttpParams are immutable. `set()` returns a new instance.

title: Invalid DI token
explanation: String tokens are deprecated/discouraged (though technically valid). Should use `InjectionToken`.

title: RouterLinkQueryParams
explanation: Adds query parameters to the link.

title: Observables cold vs hot
codeSnippet:
const obs = http.get('...');
// subscribe 2 times -> 2 requests
explanation: Cold observables (like HttpClient) re-run execution logic on each subscribe. Use `shareReplay` to make it hot (share result).

title: Validators pattern
explanation: Validates control value against regex.

title: Component Factory Resolver deprecated
explanation: Deprecated in favor of `viewContainerRef.createComponent(Component)` since Angular 13.

title: Router Outlet name
explanation: Named outlet for auxiliary routes.

title: Input transform signature
explanation:
Implicit missing types, but valid feature (Angular 16). Not an error if TS strict mode handles it. Error might be 'transform needs to be a function'. Snippet seems okay. 
What if `transform: string`? Error.

title: NgFor trackBy string
explanation: trackBy expects a function `(index, item) => id`, not a string property name.

title: Router relative link
explanation: Supports relative navigation with `../`.

title: Missing reactive forms module
explanation: Requires `ReactiveFormsModule` imported in the NgModule/Component.

title: ParamMap
explanation: Preferred over `params` object as it handles multiple values/keys better.

title: NgIf async with null check
explanation: If `obs$` is null or async result is null, accessing `.data` throws. Use `(obs$ | async)?.data` or `*ngIf="obs$ | async as res"`.

title: NgStyle with units
explanation: Applies pixel unit automatically.

title: HostBinding collision
explanation: Two bindings to the same property 'class'. Result is undefined/last-one-wins/error.

title: Router events NavigationStart
explanation: Event emitted when navigation starts.

title: ViewChild query static false default
explanation: If `static: false` (default), ViewChild is not available in ngOnInit. It's available in ngAfterViewInit.

title: Title service
explanation: Sets browser document title.

title: Invalid pipe chaining
explanation:
Valid syntax, but logic/type might be odd. number pipe returns string '1,234'. lowercase works on string. 
Error: `{{ val | async | async }}` usually wrong (double unwrap). 
Error: `{{ val | unknownPipe }}`.

title: Impure function in binding
explanation: Impure function returns different value each call. Causes ExpressionChangedAfterItHasBeenCheckedError in dev mode.

title: DomSanitizer bypass
explanation: Marks HTML as safe to bind to innerHTML.

title: Missing enableProdMode
explanation: In PROD, should call `enableProdMode()` before bootstrap to disable dev assertions and double change detection.

title: Location service
explanation: Navigates one step back in browser history.

title: Component styles scoping
explanation: No. Default ViewEncapsulation scopes styles to the component only. Child components are not affected (unless ::ng-deep used).

title: TransferState
explanation: Transfers state from server to client to avoid re-fetching data.

title: Duplicate HttpClientModule
codeSnippet:
AppModule imports HttpClientModule
FeatureModule imports HttpClientModule
explanation: Importing HttpClientModule in lazy loaded modules overwrites providers (interceptors) from root. Should only be in AppModule.

title: NgOptimizedImage
explanation: Performance directive for images (lazy load, layout shift protection).

title: Getter side effect
explanation: Getters called from template should be pure. Side effects here trigger unpredictably during Change Detection.

title: Forms disable
explanation: Disables the control and excludes it from validation/value.

title: ContentChild vs ViewChild
explanation: Projected content (ng-content) is queried via `@ContentChild`. `@ViewChild` checks the component's own template.

title: Animation trigger
explanation: Binds animation trigger to state.

title: JSON pipe argument
explanation: JsonPipe does not take arguments (like indentation). It just calls JSON.stringify.

title: Router scrollPositionRestoration
explanation: Restores scroll position on navigation.

title: Input alias collision
explanation:
Redundant but valid. 
Error: `@Input() class` reserved word. 
Real error: `@Input() @Output() val`. Cannot be both input and output with same name usually.

title: HostBinding class collision
explanation: Prior to recent versions, mixing `class.foo` and `[class]` input was problematic (one overwrote other).

title: Meta service
explanation: Manipulates document meta tags.

title: Pure pipe arguments
codeSnippet:
transform(value, arg) 
// pure pipe doesn't update when arg changes?
explanation: Pure pipes DO update when arguments change (value or args). They don't update if args are same reference but mutated.

title: HammerJS
explanation: Supported via HammerJS for touch gestures.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular return
explanation: Return value of runOutsideAngular is the result of the function.

title: NgZone undefined this
explanation: Classic JS `this` context loss. Use arrow function.

title: Signal mutation
explanation: Signals are functions (wrappers). To update, use `.set(1)` or `.update(v => v + 1)`. Cannot assign directly.

title: Renderer2 listen
explanation: Safely attaches event listeners (platform agnostic).

title: Effect outside injection context
explanation: `effect()` must be called in an injection context (constructor) or passed an injector manually. ngOnInit is too late for default context logic.

title: ViewRef detectChanges
explanation: Manually triggers change detection for the view and its children.

title: Computed signal write
explanation: Computed signals are read-only. Cannot set them.

title: ProvideRouter
explanation: Enables new router features (like binding params to inputs) in standalone app config.

title: Signal equality custom
explanation:
Not an error. Wait, objects are strict equals? If `{id:1} !== {id:1}`, signal updates every time new object set even if content same. Error is usually forgetting implementation. Snippet is valid syntax. 
Real error: `computed(() => sig()).set(1)`.

title: ComponentInputBinding missing config
codeSnippet:
@Input() id: string; // Route param 'id'
// providers: [provideRouter(routes)] only
explanation: To bind route params to Inputs, must enable `withComponentInputBinding()` feature in router config.

title: NgZone runTask
explanation: Executes a task within the zone. Low-level API used by async tasks.

title: Hydration mismatch
explanation: Angular hydration requires DOM structure to match exactly between server and client. Mismatch causes full re-render (de-bailout).

title: MakeStateKey
explanation: Creates a typed key for TransferState.

title: InjectionToken factory deps missing
explanation: In factory function, cannot access 'dep' variable unless it's injected via `inject(Dep)`. Scope issue.

title: ViewChild read provider
explanation: Reads the MyService provider from the element match.

title: Standalone component imports Module
explanation: Ideally standalone components shouldn't import the root AppModule (cyclic or creates chaos). They should import usage-specific modules/components.

title: APP_ID
explanation: Used to prefix styles in emulated view encapsulation to allow multiple apps on same page.

title: Untracked signal in effect
explanation: Not an error, but intention check. The effect will NOT run when `sig` changes. If that's intended, correct. If user expected update, error.

title: Host directive inputs
explanation: Input mapping syntax is `['bindingName', 'alias']` or just `['bindingName']`? Wait. `inputs: ['color']` exposes 'color' as input on host. Syntax is `['inputProperty: publicName']`. `['color']` assumes same name. Valid syntax.

title: HostDirective output collision
explanation: Collision of outputs/inputs from host directives without aliasing triggers config error.

title: afterNextRender
explanation: Runs once after the next DOM update cycle completes. Context agnostic (SSR safe-ish, runs on browser).

title: Signals mutate object prop
explanation: Mutating internal state of signal value doesn't notify dependents. Use `s.update(...)` returning new object or `s.mutate(...)` (if using older Angular 16 API, but mutate was removed/deprecated in 17 favored update). Best practice: immutability.

title: ChangeDetection OnPull
explanation: It's `OnPush`, not `OnPull`.

title: Lazy load component syntax
explanation: `loadComponent` expects a function returning a promise: `() => import('./home').then(m => m.HomeCmp)`.

title: Title (meta) service
explanation: Angular provides Title service for this.

title: Function in provider factory
explanation: Factory has an argument `s` but `deps` array is empty. `s` will be undefined.

title: FormRecord
explanation: A FormGroup with dynamic keys (Angular 14+).

title: Standalone pipe in non-standalone
explanation: Standalone pipes/directives/components cannot be declared in an NgModule. They must be imported.

title: Router guards functional
explanation: Modern functional guards using `inject()`.

title: RxJS memory leak in effect
explanation: Effects run on signal changes. Subscribing inside effect creates a new subscription every run without cleaning up previous. Use `effect((onCleanup) => ...)` to unsubscribe.

title: ViewRef detach
explanation: Removes the view from the DOM/change detection tree.

title: Missing export in module
codeSnippet:
@NgModule({ declarations: [C] })
// imports this module, uses <C> error
explanation: Component C is declared but not exported. It is private to the module.

title: ng-template
explanation: Does not render anything unless instantiated (via outlet or structural directive).

title: Injector.get deprecated signature
explanation: Deprecated? No, `get(Token)` is fine. `get(Token, notFoundValue)` is standard. Maybe `injector.get('string')` deprecated (deprecated string tokens).

title: Class instead of Injectable
explanation: Missing `@Injectable()` decorator. Even if provided in module, Angular throws error if decorator missing (in Ivy), especially if constructor has deps.

title: Renderer Style flags
explanation: Flags can control style priority (e.g. Important).

title: Providers array object
explanation: Syntax error. { Service } is an object `{ Service: Service }` which is not a Provider. Need just `Service` or `{ provide: Service, ... }`.

title: NgComponentOutlet
explanation: Dynamically instantiates a component class.

title: Input transform type mismatch
explanation: `booleanAttribute` converts to boolean. Property type `string` is mismatch.

title: numberAttribute
explanation: Utility to transform input string to number (handling NaN if configs set).

title: Style url relative path
explanation: Depends. Usually needs `./component.css`. If just `css`, looks for file named `css`. Ambiguous.

title: ViewChild descendants true
explanation: Standard query.

title: Missing super in Lifecycle?
codeSnippet:
class Base implements OnInit { ngOnInit() {} }
class Child extends Base { ngOnInit() {} }
explanation: Child overrides ngOnInit. If Base ngOnInit had logic, it is lost unless `super.ngOnInit()` called. Common bug.

title: RouterLink fragment
explanation: Sets the URL fragment (hash).

title: Async pipe subscription count
explanation: Creates TWO subscriptions. If cold observable (http), two requests. Bad pattern.

title: ApplicationRef isStable
explanation: Observable emitting when no pending tasks are running (zone stable).

title: Empty providers array module
explanation: Empty array is valid. Not an error.

title: Invalid selector char
explanation: Selector must start with letter. HTML element rules apply.

title: @Attribute vs @Input
explanation: True. @Input checks bound value continuously.

title: Router empty path match
explanation: Infinite redirect risk? No. Error is missing `pathMatch: 'full'`. Default prefix match matches everything, causing infinite loop or blocking other routes.

title: MockProvider
explanation: Helper (often from ng-mocks) to mock services easily.

title: TestBed inject vs inject
explanation: `TestBed.get` is deprecated. Use `TestBed.inject`.

title: ComponentFixture autoDetectChanges
explanation: Automatically runs change detection in tests.

title: Recursive pipe declaration
codeSnippet: @Pipe({ name: 'p' }) class P { transform() { return new P().transform() } }
explanation: Infinite recursion stack overflow.

title: AsyncPipe null handling
codeSnippet: async pipe returns null for initial undefined Observable?
explanation: Returns null until first value emitted.

title: Injecting Injector
explanation:
Valid. Not an error. 
Real Error: `constructor(private r: Renderer)`. Renderer is deprecated in favor of Renderer2.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular error handler
explanation: Errors thrown inside runOutsideAngular are NOT caught by Angular's ErrorHandler. They become global unhandled rejections/errors.

title: ApplicationInitStatus
explanation: Promise that resolves when app initialization (APP_INITIALIZER) is done.

title: Injecting ViewContainerRef in Service
explanation: Singleton services cannot inject `ViewContainerRef` because it's tied to a specific component view.

title: Component mirror
explanation: Returns ComponentMirror with metadata (inputs, outputs, selector) without instantiating.

title: Standalone component imports CommonModule
explanation: Correct usage. No error. Trick question.

title: Input transform non-static
explanation: Input transform function must be statically resolvable (standalone function), not an instance method `this.method`.

title: Animation builder
explanation: Programmatically builds animations.

title: HostBinding style unit missing
explanation: Setting number 100 to style.width results in '100', which is invalid CSS (needs 'px' or '%'). Use `style.width.px`.

title: TestBed.flushEffects
explanation: Flushes any pending effects in tests.

title: Injecting ElementRef in Service
explanation: Services have no ElementRef.

title: Router createUrlTree
explanation: Creates a UrlTree for navigation or guards.

title: Missing declarations in test
explanation: Must declare the component under test in `declarations` (unless standalone).

title: DebugElement query
explanation: Available in tests to find elements.

title: NgIf then else sequence
explanation:
Correct syntax. Not error. 
Error: `*ngIf="c; then #t"` (invalid syntax, needs template ref variable name without # in usage side ? No, usage is name 't'). 
Real error: `*ngIf="c" then t else e`. Missing semicolons.

title: RouterLinkActive inputs
explanation: `routerLinkActive` expects a class name (string) or array of strings. It doesn't take a boolean.

title: ComponentRef setInput
explanation: Sets an input on a dynamically created component (handles signals and changes properly).

title: Multi provider default
explanation: Missing `multi: true`. This overwrites all other interceptors instead of adding to them.

title: Fallback provider
explanation: Injectors can have fallbacks.

title: Signal in template without parens
explanation: If `count` is a signal, this renders the function code string. Must be `{{ count() }}`.

title: RxJS connectable
explanation: Creates a connectable observable (multicasting).

title: Async pipe in logic
explanation: Async pipe is for templates only. Cannot use in TS code.

title: NoopAnimationsModule
explanation: Disables animations (useful for testing or simplicity).

title: NgZone onMicrotaskEmpty
explanation:
Valid API. Why error? 
Maybe snippet implies public usage. It is used internally for CD. 
Real error: `zone.run(() => { await p; })` ? 
Let's try: `constructor(public zone: NgZone) { zone.runOutsideAngular(...) }`. Valid. 
Error: `runOutsideAngular` returns observable? No. 
Error: `run()` doesn't return value? It does. 
Error: `zone.current` ? Zone.current is generic Zone.js.

title: HostBinding invalid property
explanation: Binding to unknown DOM property doesn't throw at compile time but fails silently or throws at runtime in browser.

title: EventManager
explanation: Internal service handling event plugins.

title: Duplicate declaration in module
explanation: Duplicate declarations cause compilation error.

title: ComponentRef destroy
explanation: Manually destroys a dynamically created component.

title: Schema missing for custom element
explanation: If using Web Components, must add `schemas: [CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA]` to NgModule.

title: IsStandAlone
explanation: Checks if component is standalone.

title: Pipe pure defaults
explanation: Not error, just redundant. Default IS pure: true. Explicit false is what matters.

title: Invalid hostListener argument
explanation: Scroll event usually doesn't have target.value (it's the window or document). Accessing random path might cause error.

title: ChangeDetection On Push with async pipe
codeSnippet: Async pipe triggers change detection even in OnPush components.
explanation: Async pipe calls `markForCheck()` internally.

title: NgClass string syntax
explanation: Syntax error. If passing string, must quote it: `[ngClass]="'class1 class2'"`. Without quotes, looks for property `class1`.

title: KeyEventsPlugin
explanation: Built-in support for key combinations.

title: Template variable shadowing
codeSnippet: {{ i }}
explanation: Variable `i` shadows the outer `i`. Valid but poor practice/confusing.

title: TitleCasePipe
explanation: Capitalizes first letter of each word.

title: ContentChildren query static
explanation: Content queries cannot be static (content is not available until projection). Only ViewChild can be static.

title: ForwardRef
explanation: Allows referring to a class not yet defined (hoisting).

title: NullInjectorError
explanation: Means the service is injected but not provided in any NgModule or Component injector tree.

title: APP_BASE_HREF
explanation: Configures the base URL for router.

title: Observable multicast refcount
explanation:
Valid. 
Real error: `o.pipe(shareReplay(1))` without `refCount: true` can cause leaks if subscribers disconnect? Actually shareReplay defaults refCounting to false in old versions (leaks), but true in new (safe)? Or unpredictable. Best to be explicit.

title: ViewChild setter loop
explanation: Infinite recursion. Setter calls itself via `this.c = v`.

title: DoCheck
explanation: Custom change detection logic hook. Runs frequently.

title: Exporting private component
explanation: Cannot export a component that is not declared (declarations array) or imported.

title: ClassProvider
explanation: Swaps implementation class.

title: Template no-op
explanation:
Self closing ng-container is standard syntax now. 
Error: `<ng-container *ngFor="...">` used correctly. 
Real error: `<ng-content *ngIf="...">`. `ng-content` is projected BEFORE view init. `*ngIf` on `ng-content` logic is often broken or misunderstood (it hides the projection slot, but projection compilation happened). Use wrapper.

title: ValueProvider
explanation: Injects a static value.

title: Async pipe memory leak
explanation: Again, async pipe DOES NOT leak. It unsubscribes automatically.

title: FactoryProvider
explanation: Uses a function to create dependency.

title: Directive without selector
explanation: Directive MUST have a selector (unless it's an abstract base class, in which case `@Directive()` with no args or just class is used, but snippet implies concrete). Concrete needs selector.

title: ExistingProvider
explanation: Maps token A to the same instance as token B.

title: Output emit inside template
explanation: Valid, but often considered antipattern to emit directly from template. Logic should be in method.

title: I18nPluralPipe
explanation: Handles pluralization.

title: Missing styles extension
explanation: Missing file extension `.css` (or scss). Build often fails.

title: NgModule id
explanation: NgModule `id` property is rarely used/documented. If used, must be consistent. Not strictly error but suspicious.

title: ModuleWithProviders missing generic
explanation: Since Angular 10, `ModuleWithProviders` requires a generic type argument: `ModuleWithProviders<RootModule>`.

title: TestBed overrideProvider
explanation: Overrides a provider in the test module.

title: NgContent select by class
explanation:
Valid syntax. Selects elements with class 'loading'. 
Error: `select="ng-container"`. `ng-container` is not an element, cannot be selected? It might work if projected manually but usually weird. 
Real error: `select` only supports simple CSS selectors (tag, class, attr, not id or complex combinators in some versions).

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular returns result
explanation: Returns the function result.

title: Standalone component indeclarations
explanation: Standalone components must be imported, not declared.

title: Schematics
explanation: Uses Angular Schematics to scaffold code.

title: DomSanitizer safe value usage
explanation: Interpolation `{{ }}` always stringifies. Safe HTML objects must be bound to `[innerHTML]="html"` to render as HTML.

title: Router initialNavigation
explanation: Starts navigation before root component init (SSR hydration critical).

title: Pipe stateful
codeSnippet:
@Pipe({ name: 'p' })
class P { v = 0; transform(x) { this.v++; return x + this.v; } }
explanation: Stateful pipes must set `pure: false` to be reliable if they depend on internal state or change detection cycles.

title: ComponentRef location
explanation: Accesses the DOM element of the component.

title: Missing providers in standalone
codeSnippet:
@Component({ standalone: true, template: '' })
class C { constructor(s: Service) {} }
explanation: If 'Service' is not provided in root, it must be in `providers` array of the component or imported via a module that provides it.

title: RouterOutlet activate event
explanation: Emits the activated component instance when navigation completes.

title: Output rename
explanation: If aliased as 'alias', must bind to `(alias)="handle()"`, not `(out)`.

title: NgPlural
explanation: Structural directive for pluralization cases.

title: Guard return type void
explanation: Guard must return `true`, `false`, `UrlTree`, or Observable/Promise of these. Returning `void` (undefined) generally treats as `true` (allow) in some versions? No, usually treated as false or hangs. Should return `false` or `UrlTree`.

title: Animation trigger params
explanation: Animations can be reusable with params.

title: NgZone run arguments
explanation: `run()` takes a function as first argument. `run(() => logic, applyThis, applyArgs)`.

title: Router parseUrl
explanation: Parses string into UrlTree.

title: HostListener window scroll args
explanation:
If args array is empty `@HostListener('window:scroll')`, `e` is undefined but function runs. To get event, must specify `$event` in args array. Snippet has it. Is there error? 
Maybe return value? 
Real error: `window:scroll` event is frequent. Binding it runs change detection every scroll. Performance kill. Should use `ngZone.runOutsideAngular` via manual listener in ngOnInit.

title: Key value differs
explanation: Service to track changes in objects (used by ngClass, ngStyle).

title: Missing Component Imports in Standalone
explanation: Standalone component must import `ChildCmp` in `imports` array to use it.

title: Hydration feature
explanation: Enables non-destructive hydration.

title: Circular dependency tokens
codeSnippet: A depends on B, B depends on A
explanation: Angular DI throws Circular dependency error. Use `@Inject(forwardRef(() => A))`.

title: APP_INITIALIZER multi
explanation: Allows multiple initializers.

title: Route path slash
explanation: Route paths should not start with a slash `/`. It's implied relative to parent.

title: RouterLinkWithHref
codeSnippet: Directive applied to <a> tags with routerLink.
explanation: Distinct from RouterLink (applied to other tags) because <a> needs href property update.

title: Optional dependency inject
explanation: If service is not found, `s` is null. calling `s.do()` throws. Check for null.

title: Self decorator
codeSnippet: @Self() implies lookup only in local injector.
explanation: Does not walk up the tree.

title: Missing super call in derived service
codeSnippet:
class Base { constructor(private d: Dep) {} }
class Derived extends Base { constructor() {} }
explanation: Derived class constructor must call `super()` with required arguments if Base constructor requires them.

title: SkipSelf
explanation: Skips local provider.

title: FormGroup vs FormControl directive
explanation: `[formControl]` expects a `FormControl` instance. `group` is likely `FormGroup`. Use `[formGroup]`.

title: Host
codeSnippet: @Host() limits search to host component view.
explanation: Stops at the host element.

title: NgModel in Reactive Form
explanation: Mixing `ngModel` and `formControl` is deprecated and discouraged. Pick one.

title: ControlContainer
explanation: Allows child component to access parent FormGroupName/FormGroupDirective.

title: Async validator return
codeSnippet:
validate(c): Observable<any> { return of({err: true}) } 
// configured as sync validator
explanation: If configured in `validators` (sync), returning Observable is truthy (valid), ignoring the error content. Must be in `asyncValidators`.

title: Validators composition
explanation: Merges multiple validators into one.

title: Cross field validator placement
codeSnippet: const group = fb.group({ p1: '', p2: '' }, { validator: myVal })
explanation: Legacy syntax. New syntax (since v7?) `fb.group({...}, { validators: myVal })`. `validator` property is old.

title: FormBuilder nonNullable
explanation: Creates controls that don't accept null and reset to initial value.

title: Missing trackBy in NgFor
explanation: Not an error, but a performance issue for large lists. Should use `trackBy` to prevent full DOM re-rendering on list updates.

title: Route reuse strategy
explanation: Method to control reusing route components (Tab implementations).

title: Deep import
explanation: Deep imports into private APIs (`src/`) are forbidden and unstable.

title: ViewEncapsulation ShadowDom
explanation: Uses native Shadow DOM for style isolation.

title: Lazy loaded module importing feature
explanation: Lazy modules should NEVER import AppModule (root). Creates separate instance of root services.

title: PreloadingStrategy
explanation: Strategy to preload lazy modules in background.

title: Unsubscribe missing
explanation: Memory leak if component is destroyed. Should unsubscribe in ngOnDestroy (or use async pipe/takeUntilDestroyed).

title: Router events filter
explanation: Common pattern to react to navigation completion.

title: ChangeDetectorRef markForCheck checkNoChanges
explanation: Throws if any change is detected (used in dev mode). User likely meant `detectChanges()` or `markForCheck()`.

title: OnDestroy
explanation: Cleanup hook.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular usage 2
explanation: Updating binding `this.result` inside runOutsideAngular won't trigger update visually. Need `ngZone.run()` or `cdr.detectChanges()`.

title: Module id uniqueness
codeSnippet:
@NgModule({ id: 'shared' }) class A {}
@NgModule({ id: 'shared' }) class B {}
explanation: If `id` is used, it must be unique per module class. Reusing it causes collision in module factory cache.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular auto-detect
codeSnippet: Does runOutsideAngular automatically trigger change detection?
explanation: The whole point is to NOT trigger change detection.

title: PlatformRef destroy
explanation: Destroys the entire platform and all Angular apps on the page. Use with caution (valid API but drastic).

title: ViewRef destroyed
explanation: Boolean indicating if view has been destroyed.

title: Pipe pure change detection
codeSnippet:
@Pipe({name: 'p'}) // pure: true
transform(arr) { return arr.filter(x => x > 0) }
explanation: If `arr` is mutated in place (push), pure pipe won't re-run. Must return new array reference or allow mutation detection (impure).

title: IterableDiffers
explanation: Service to track changes in iterables (arrays). Used by NgFor.

title: NgStyle dash case
explanation:
Correct syntax. Dash case must be quoted. 
Error: `[ngStyle]="{ background-color: 'red' }"` (syntax error key). 
Real error: `[ngStyle]="'color: red'"` (unsupported string format, expects object).

title: Router parseUrl encoded
explanation:
Works fine. 
Real error: `router.navigateByUrl('/path space')` (unencoded space might fail or be auto-encoded?)

title: Sanitizer Security Context
explanation: enum defining context (HTML, URL, SCRIPT, etc).

title: HostListener keyup space
explanation:
Valid pseudo-event. 
Error: `@HostListener('keyup.unknownKey')`. 
Real error: `@HostListener('click', ['$event.target.data'])` - accessing undefined property.

title: Meta updateTag
explanation: Updates existing tag or adds if not found (if selector matches?). Update logic specific.

title: InjectionToken tree-shakeable
codeSnippet:
const T = new InjectionToken('T', { providedIn: 'root' });
// factory missing?
explanation: If `providedIn` is used, `factory` is REQUIRED to tell how to create it. Missing factory.

title: Title setTitle
explanation: Sets document title.

title: Async pipe non-observable
explanation: Async pipe expects Observable or Promise. Passing string throws 'InvalidPipeArgument'.

title: TestBed resetTestingModule
explanation: Resets the configuration (common in afterEach).

title: RouterLink on button
explanation:
Valid. RouterLink works on any element. 
Error: `<button href="/home">` (reloads page).

title: DefaultIterableDiffer
codeSnippet: Default implementation of track changes in array.
explanation: Internal class used by NgFor.

title: Duplicate provider in component
explanation: Duplicate providers. Last one wins, but redundant.

title: Compiler
codeSnippet: Low-level service for compiling modules/components at runtime (JIT).
explanation: Mostly abstracted away in AOT, but exists.

title: Style encapsulation None leak
explanation: Sets body color globally for the entire app. Often unintended side effect.

title: APP_ID default
explanation: Yes, unless provided.

title: NgForOf vs NgFor
explanation: Syntax is `*ngFor="let item of items"`. `NgForOf` is the class name.

title: Version
explanation: Contains angular version string.

title: Invalid host binding syntax
explanation: Should be string without brackets: `@HostBinding('class.active')`.

title: Animation trigger disabled
explanation: Disables animations on the element and children.

title: Constructor missing type
explanation:
Valid if TOKEN is typed or untyped usage. 
Error: `constructor(val)` (implicit any, no token, no type). Angular can't inject.

title: ContentChild static default
explanation: Default static is false. If you try to access `c` in ngOnInit, it's undefined. Must wait for ngAfterContentInit.

title: defineComponent
explanation: Internal API used by compiler.

title: NgIf shadowing variable
explanation: Shadowing the outer `user` variable is allowed but potential confusion. Not strictly an error.

title: ViewRef detectChanges vs checkNoChanges
explanation: Only useful for debugging/testing. In prod code it verifies no changes happened, throwing if they did. Use `detectChanges` to actually update.

title: INJECTOR token
explanation: Gets the current injector.

title: Missing generic in EventEmitter
explanation: Defaults to `any`. Should use `new EventEmitter<Type>()` for strict typing.

title: Self, SkipSelf combination
explanation: Mutually exclusive. Self checks ONLY local. SkipSelf checks ONLY parent. Together -> nowhere (or error).

title: RouterLink array with null
explanation: Null segment in commands array usually ignored or treated as 'null' string? Or Error?  Wait, it converts to `'/path/null'`. Might be unintended.

title: ViewChildren changes
explanation: Emits when query results change.

title: NgFor trackBy argument count
explanation: Signature is `(index, item) => id`. First arg is index.

title: NgZone runGuarded
explanation: Same as run() but catches errors and sends to ErrorHandler.

title: Input decorator on private property
explanation: Inputs are set by parent template, so they effectively need public access (or protected? but usage in template implies public in AOT). Private technically works in JIT but fails AOT/strict templates.

title: CompilerOptions
explanation: preserveWhitespaces, etc.

title: HostListener non-event
explanation: If 'something' is not a DOM event or custom event emitted by host, listener never fires.

title: ElementRef nativeElement type
explanation: Typed as `any` (or T) because it could be non-browser platform element.

title: ViewChild read wrong token
explanation: If service is not provided on that element, query returns undefined/null.

title: KeyValueDiffer diff
explanation: Checks for changes since last diff.

title: InjectionToken desc
explanation: Description string is required argument (since v4+ to debug).

title: NgZone assertInAngularZone
explanation: Throws if not inside angular zone.

title: Style binding vs NgStyle
explanation: `[style]` input doesn't exist on standard HTML elements. Use `[ngStyle]` or `[style.prop]`.

title: ApplicationRef tick
explanation: Triggers change detection for the whole application.

title: Output emit arg missing
explanation: If generic is `string`, `emit(val)` requires a string. `emit()` sends undefined.

title: DebugNode
explanation: DebugElement extends DebugNode (adds children, listeners).

title: ChangeDetection Detached
explanation: If detached, manual `detectChanges()` is required or `reattach()`. Otherwise UI is stale.

title: ModuleWithComponentFactories
explanation: Used in JIT compilation flow.

title: Inject flags optional
explanation:
Signature is correct (since v14?). Older instructions used `flags` enum. Confirming syntax... `InjectFlags` deprecated, options object preferred. This code is Correct. 
Fake Error: `inject(Token, InjectFlags.Optional)` (also valid). 
Real error: `inject(Token)` throws if not found.

title: Attribute decorator args
explanation: `@Attribute('attributeName')` requires the attribute name string argument.

title: Module export as provider
explanation: Services/Providers cannot be exported. `exports` is for Declarables (Components, Directives, Pipes) and other Modules.

title: NgZone onUnstable
explanation: Emits when code enters the Angular zone (becomes unstable).

title: Router guards wait
explanation: Not an error, but UX issue. Navigation hangs for 10s with no feedback. Technically valid return.

title: Binding reserved attribute
explanation:
Works. 
Real error: `<div [style]="sts">`. [style] isn't a property. It's a special syntax but needs `[style.prop]` or `[ngStyle]`. Wait, `[style]="string"` might assign to style property? `element.style` is object. Assigning string fails.

title: Sanitizer String
explanation: Sanitizes value for context, returning safe string.

title: ChangeDetectionStrategy Default children
explanation: No. If OnPush parent is not dirty, CD stops there and doesn't reach children, even if child is Default.

title: directiveInject
explanation: Internal instruction for dependency injection.

title: Pure pipe array push
explanation: Pure pipe won't update output because reference didn't change.

title: LOCALE_ID
explanation: Sets the locale for the app (pipes, etc).

title: Reactive Forms valueChanges infinite
explanation: Infinite loop. `setValue` triggers `valueChanges`. Must use `{emitEvent: false}` or `distinctUntilChanged` check.

title: NoopNgZone
explanation: Disables Zone.js entirely (zoneless mode).

title: ElementRef mismatch
explanation: Runtime ok, TS type mismatch. But DI doesn't know. Code trying `e.nativeElement.disabled` on div will fail.

title: ComponentFactory
codeSnippet: Factory to create components dynamically (pre-Ivy mostly/compat).
explanation: Valid class.

title: Style URL 404
explanation: Build failure.

title: PlatformRef
codeSnippet: Entry point for Angular on a platform (browser/server).
explanation: Created via `platformBrowserDynamic()` etc.

title: HostListener global target
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `@HostListener('body:click')` - 'body' is valid target. 
Real error: `@HostListener('parent:click')` - 'parent' is NOT a valid target. Only window, document, body.

title: NgComponentOutletInputs
explanation: Example: `[inputs]="{ foo: 'bar' }"`.

title: Router lazy load string syntax
explanation: Deprecated since v8. Must use import syntax `() => import(...)`.

title: UrlMatcher
codeSnippet: Custom logic to match URL to route.
explanation: Replaces standard `path` property.

title: Constructor implementation in interface
explanation: TypeScript error, not specific to Angular but common. Interfaces describe shape, not constructor.

title: TestBed.compileComponents
codeSnippet: Compiles template/css for components declared in testing module.
explanation: Required if using `styleUrls`/`templateUrl` and not using a CLI that handles this.

title: Async pipe reuse
explanation: Two subscriptions. Use alias: `*ngIf="o | async as val"`.

title: CanMatch
explanation: CanMatch allows multiple routes with same path to be filtered.

title: Missing browser module
explanation: Root module MUST import `BrowserModule`. `CommonModule` is for feature modules.

title: DomSanitizer bypassSecurityTrustResourceUrl
explanation: Prevents XSS in sensitive URLs.

title: HttpInterceptor provider multi
codeSnippet: { provide: HTTP_INTERCEPTORS, useClass: I, multi: false }
explanation: `multi: true` is MANDATORY for interceptors.

title: AbstractControl
explanation: Defines common API (value, valid, etc).

title: Template variable reuse
explanation: Duplicate template reference variable `#ref` in same scope.

title: QueryList first
explanation: Accessor for first item in query list.

title: ViewChild wrong type
explanation: TS mismatch. Div is not Button. (Assuming #div is on a div tag).

title: SwUpdate
explanation: Manages caching updates.

title: NgSwitch default case
explanation:
Valid. 
Error: `*ngSwitchCaseDefault` (wrong name).

title: Router pathMatch required
explanation: Redirect from empty path requires `pathMatch: 'full'`.

title: RouterLinkActive isActive
explanation: Can access active state in template.

title: ProvidedIn invalid value
explanation: `providedIn` accepts 'root', 'platform', 'any', or a Type. String 'childModule' is invalid (unless it's a type name, but usually passed as reference).

title: ViewRef rootNodes
explanation: DOM nodes associated with the view.

title: Injecting Service in Config
explanation:
Valid, provided Service is available. 
Error: Injecting `Router` in `APP_INITIALIZER` (sometimes cyclic if router depends on init). Use `Injector` to lazy fetch.

title: Component styles array
explanation: Inline styles definition.

title: NgZone run return type
explanation: Type mismatch. Returns number.

title: ViewChild read ElementRef
explanation: Forces to read ElementRef instead of Component instance.

title: Missing declarations
explanation: If 'app-comp' is not a known element: missing declaration or import.

title: CUSTOM_ELEMENTS_SCHEMA
explanation: Suppress compiler errors for non-angular tags.

title: HostBinding on private
explanation: HostBinding works on private properties? Angular compiler might complain in AOT/strict mode, but generally supported in JIT. In strict AOT, maybe.

title: NgModel options
explanation: Allows using ngModel in a Reactive Form without control binding.

title: Circular Module Import
codeSnippet: ModuleA imports ModuleB, ModuleB imports ModuleA
explanation: Infinite loop during compilation/runtime.

title: HashLocationStrategy
explanation: Uses /#/ path style.

title: Pure pipe async issue
explanation: Pure pipes return value. If they return promise/observable, the template renders [object Promise]. Needs AsyncPipe to unwrap.

title: Animation trigger transition
explanation: Matches any state change.

title: InjectionToken null
explanation: Cannot inject null.

title: SkipSelf vs Optional
explanation: @SkipSelf() @Optional() -> searches parent, returns null if not found.

title: Constructor return
explanation: Constructors shouldn't return values. It generally ignores it or breaks logic.

title: ModuleWithProviders return type
codeSnippet: static forRoot(): any { return { ngModule: M, providers: [] } }
explanation: Type safety lost. Should return `ModuleWithProviders<M>`. `any` hides potential structure errors.

title: NgZone runOutsideAngular error ref handling
codeSnippet: Does ErrorHandler catch errors inside runOutsideAngular?
explanation: No. Errors outside Angular zone are not caught by Angular's ErrorHandler unless re-entered.

title: HostListener on same element
explanation: Double binding. `(click)` in template AND `@HostListener`. Function calls twice.

title: Hydration skip
explanation: Attribute to skip hydration for a component subtree.

title: RouterLinkActive options exact
explanation:
Correct. 
Error: `[routerLinkActiveOptions]="{ verify: true }"`. Property is `exact`.

title: DOCUMENT token
explanation: Platform-agnostic access to the document.

title: Component inherits decorator
codeSnippet:
@Component({...}) class Base {}
class Derived extends Base {}
explanation: Decorators are NOT inherited. Derived class needs its own `@Component` (or be abstract/directiveless). If simple class, it's not a component.

title: NgTemplateOutlet context
explanation: Passes data to the template.

title: Input transform type mismatch
explanation: If transformed to number, property type should be `number`, not `string`.

title: Title service getTitle
explanation: Gets current title.

title: Unused HostBinding
explanation:
Detailed: returning null removes the attribute. Not error, but maybe unexpected if they wanted empty string. 
Real error: Getter with side effects? No. 
Fake Error: Valid code.

title: Router events NavigationStart
explanation: Emitted when navigation starts.

title: NgFor trackBy identity
explanation: Tracking by item reference is the DEFAULT behavior. Redundant to specify if identity is used. But implies they might have meant `item.id`. If item reference changes (immutability), full re-render happens. So it's 'correct syntax' but 'bad practice' if optimization was intended.

title: ComponentRef destroy
explanation: Destroys the component and removes from DOM.

title: ViewChild static true usage
explanation: Valid only if 'ref' is NOT inside *ngIf or structural directive. If it is, static: true returns undefined (or throws in older versions).

title: APP_BASE_HREF
explanation: Alternatiive to <base href> tag.

title: Service providedIn 'any'
explanation: Creates a new instance for every lazy module that injects it. Usually 'root' is preferred for singletons. 'any' is tricky behavior.

title: NgZone runTask
codeSnippet: Internal method to run a task.
explanation: Mostly internal.

title: Pipe pure: false explicit
explanation: Valid. Impure pipe. Performance cost warning.

title: TransferState
codeSnippet: Transfer state from server to client.
explanation: Prevents double HTTP requests.

title: Async pipe in logic
explanation: Pipe syntax `|` is for Templates ONLY. In TS, use `.subscribe()` or `firstValueFrom`.

title: Location back
explanation: Navigates back in history.

title: CanDeactivate generics
explanation: Should specify component type: `CanDeactivate<ComponentType>`. Otherwise arguments are untyped.

title: Router initialNavigation disabled
explanation: Disables initial navigation.

title: Missing providers for pipe
explanation: Pipes are not providers by default. Must add `MyPipe` to `providers` array in module/component to inject it as service.

title: ViewRef markForCheck
explanation: Used with OnPush.

title: Input aliasing confusion
explanation: If aliased as 'val', binding must be `[val]="1"`. `[value]` won't work.

title: PlatformBrowserDynamic
explanation: Includes compiler.

title: Lazy Load incorrect syntax
explanation: Must return the NgModule class/Routes, not the module object itself? Actually `m.ModuleClass` usually. `m => m` returns the whole module namespace object. Angular needs the class unless it's default export (rare in Angular). Usually `m => m.MyModule`.

title: TestBed inject
explanation: Replaces `TestBed.get`.

title: Structural directive bracket
explanation: Invalid syntax. Either string `*ngFor="items"` or property `[ngForOf]="items"`.

title: RouterLink queryParams
explanation: Adds ?p=1 to url.

title: HostListener unbind
explanation: Cannot manually unbind `@HostListener`. It unbinds on destroy. For manual control, use `Renderer2.listen`.

title: KeyValuePipe
explanation: `*ngFor="let item of obj | keyvalue"`.

title: Output alias empty
explanation: Empty alias string? Likely error or falls back to property name. Bad practice.

title: SlicePipe
explanation: Slices array or string.

title: Duplicate module import
explanation: Redundant. No error (Angular dedupes), but sloppy.

title: JsonPipe
explanation: JSON.stringify internally.

title: Bound event uppercase
explanation: Events are case sensitive. `click` is standard. `CLICK` won't fire for native click.

title: Component inheritance inputs
codeSnippet: Inputs are inherited available in template?
explanation: Yes, if base class has @Input/Output, derived component inherits metadata (Ivy).

title: Private constructor DI
explanation: Private constructor prevents class instantiation by DI (factory).

title: CurrencyPipe code
explanation: Formats currency.

title: NgIf else template ref missing
explanation: If no `<ng-template #pending>` exists, throws error.

title: DatePipe format
explanation: Formats date.

title: Service worker scope mismatch
explanation:
Not error. 
Real error: Scope issues. 
Fake Error: Valid strategy.

title: DecimalPipe
explanation: Digits info format.

title: Router empty path match default
explanation: Prefix match by default. Matches everything URL starting with empty string (everything). Effectively default route. Often causes issues if not last or exact.

title: I18nPluralPipe
explanation: Complex pluralization rules.

title: Missing animation trigger
explanation: If 'fade' trigger is not defined in metadata, throws error.

title: Animation animateChild
explanation: Runs child component animations.

title: ModuleWithProviders without Generic in Function
explanation: Implicit `any` generic for ModuleWithProviders is deprecated. Should be `ModuleWithProviders<AppModule>`.

title: Router PreloadingStrategy Data
explanation: Preloading strategy receive route with data, allowing custom flags.

title: Async Pipe Subscription Leak
explanation: Using both manual subscribe and async pipe creates two subscriptions. Potential side effects or double requests.

title: ChangeDetectorRef reattach
codeSnippet: reattaches view to change detection tree
explanation: Opposite of detach().

title: NgClass string vs array
explanation:
Valid. String is supported.
Error: `[ngClass]="{ class1, class2 }"` (syntax error if variables not defined, meant `{'class1': true}`).

title: ViewEncapsulation Emulated
explanation: Uses attributes to simulate scoping.
